Welcome to Daily Plan Creator! This generator is created to make plans without boring routine. How to use:
Pleasures. Enter pleasure's name and probability of this pleasure to be allowed in the next plan (why it's important - youtu.be/9QiE-M1LrZk)
Schedule, paragraphs. Enter paragraph's name, start and end time

Schedule, work blocks. Enter work block's start time, end time and amount of time for tasks and work. When plan is being generated, work block fills with tasks (about them later) and "work cycles". Work cycle is just a paragraph where you work, then rest at the end. Also activity is assigned to work cycle (about them later). Block's left time will be time to rest

Activities. Those ones that are assigned to work cycles. Just enter activity's name and weight. Higher the weight, higher the chance this activity will be in your next schedule and in your work cycles. Also choose amount of activities that will be in your next schedule
Tasks. Enter task's name, amount of time to do and work blocks in which this task may appear
When all preparations are complete, just press the "Go!" and your plan will be waiting for you. Have a great time using this program!
